name: DiscordAuth
author: Shroomok
description: Allow users from specified Discord server access to your wiki

DiscordAuthGuildId.descriptionmsg: Integer. Guild (server) id of your Discord Community

DiscordAuthApprovedRoles.descriptionmsg: Array of strings. An array of Discord Role names. Discord users with the following roles are allowed to login to wiki

DiscordAuthCollectEmail.descriptionmsg: Boolean. This flag regulates whether the user's Discord email should be collected and used to create their wiki account

DiscordAuthPrependDiscordToWikiUsername.descriptionmsg: Boolean. This flag regulates whether "Discord" should be prepended to their wiki username to distinguish them from locally created users

DiscordAuthRegisterNS.descriptionmsg: This flag regulates whether to run onMediaWikiServices hook or not which registers Discord NS, group, and permissions

DiscordAuthShowUserContributionsOnMainPa.descriptionmsg: Change main page to make it easier for navigation and writing new articles for Discord user
